artist: Artist: François Lemoyne; Artist: Formerly attributed to Gaspard Duchange

inscription:
Inscription

LR in pen and brown ink [Duchange del]

markings: [No. 54], in pencil, on verso; [no. 11], in ink, upper right corner on recto; [Duchange del.], in pen and brown ink, lower left corner recto
medium: Black and white chalk on laid paper
provenance: Charles-Philippe, Marquis de Chennevières (L.2073), Paris (after 1865-'d. 1899); David Daniels (until 1966; gave to MIA)
title: Bacchus
